issues: Coordinate mismatch: 4.44 km distance between asserted coordinates (42.476365, -85.451887) and geocoded location from 'USA: Michigan, Delton' (42.4997581, -85.4080641)
Land cover conflict: Asserted 'agricultural field' with 'farm soil' conflicts with inferred land cover showing savanna/woodland characteristics (10-30% tree cover)
Environmental hierarchy inconsistency: env_broad_scale 'temperate woodland biome' does not align well with asserted agricultural context
Semantic conflict: Sample claimed as 'agricultural field' but inferred land cover suggests savanna/sparse forest ecosystem
Geographic inconsistency: Asserted coordinates place sample in Prairieville, but geo_loc_name indicates Delton (4.44 km apart)
recommendations: Verify and correct coordinate accuracy - determine if coordinates should match Delton (42.4997581, -85.4080641) or if location name should be updated to Prairieville
Re-examine environmental classification: if truly agricultural, consider env_broad_scale terms like 'anthropogenic terrestrial biome' rather than 'temperate woodland biome'
Cross-validate land cover data with field observations - agricultural switchgrass fields should not show 10-30% tree cover
Update ecosystem hierarchy to be internally consistent: agricultural field → crop field → farm soil is more appropriate than woodland → agricultural → farm
Consider temporal aspects: verify if land use changed between 2017 collection and 2018 land cover data
Standardize coordinate precision and validate against known field site locations within the study
